Package com.senacor.portal.sc.backend.configuration

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuditConfiguration
    Configuration enabling audit properties in model
    CustomAuthenticationToken
    Custom auth token, already authenticated, containing authorities (roles) for application security management
    InitialDataLoader
    Initial data loader is executed on on startup and makes: 1.
    JacksonConfiguration
    Configuration for Jackson mapper
    JWTAuthenticationFilter
    JWT filter based on custom authentication logic, takes JWT as a header input, convert it accordingly, checks if the employee is stored in the database, assign roles, binds auth into the security context
    MvcConfig
    Config of MVC - CORS mapping
    RestConfiguration
    Custom configuration of rest template
    ScheduleConfiguration
    Separate configuration for scheduled tasks
    SpringFoxConfig  
    VelocityConfiguration
    Configuration for handling mail templates stored in resources
    WebConfig  
    WebSecurityConfigurer
    Configuration of Web Security - enabling web security with custom implementation
